title: nIraja nayani
sahitya:
nIraja nayani nirupama mOhini natajana pAlini nityakalyANi


anupallavi

  nArAyaNi niravadi sukhadAyaki narasimhadEvi nAda rUpiNi


caraNam    ambujavAsini Agama sancAriNi amitagunamayi Anandamayi
tumburu nArada vinuta pAlini dharma samvardhani bharaNi pAlini
